snippet: Anthony Davis had 20 points and 12 rebounds for New Orleans, and Ersan Ilyasova’s 3-point attempt at the final horn rattled off the inside of the rim twice.
abstract: New Orleans Pelicans beat Milwaukee Bucks, 85-84, in NBA action; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Anthony Davis had 20 points and 12 rebounds for New Orleans, and Ersan Ilyasova’s 3-point attempt at the final horn rattled off the inside of the rim twice.

headline.main: Pelicans Edge Bucks to Move Back Into Playoff Spot
